text:
<#C22PU4LV8|general> - I just joined the group. We would be using HubSpot as CRM for handling the leads. Today, We have custom dashboards built for our Operations to manage the leads. How can I integrate the custom dashboards into HubSpot or else how can we fetch and display the external URLs of our dashboards for a lead in HubSpot?

Essentially making HubSpot as the single page for the operations to rely on.

Can I get guidance on this.

Hi Devs, Anyone worked on ConnectWise and HubSpot integration via their app - <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/22317940/marketplace/apps/productivity/project-management/connectwise-manage-data-sync> - currently we can only use one rule to sync the data, I have tried multiple rules to sync data but either the number of contacts that are syncing are low or high in numbers but never the exact number of contacts according to the rule that is set for sync - I also tried my hand at asking in the community - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/9881-Operations-Hub/ConnectWise-and-HubSpot-Contacts-Integration/td-p/673594> - but got no help yet, If anyone could point me in the right direction or has a solution, please let me know

Where are the custom dashboards built?

On a HubSpot Dashboard, you can click Actions on the top right, then you can “Add images, text, or video” to link out or “Add external content” if you have an embed code

<@U03MJJ5Q4AG> - Ty for responding on my query.
Our custom dashboards are web pages running on our servers, Can provide a hyperlink to HubSpot Dashboards?

Ohh I thought you wanted to display something from another source on HubSpot - are you trying to display HubSpot dashboards on your web pages? As far as I know you cannot access HubSpot dashboards outside of HubSpot

My HubSpot account is set up through my company’s organization and uses SSO to sign in. I created a CMS dev portal under it, but when I try to access my dev portal, it takes me to the login page, and when I try to login with SSO, I get this message (see image). What am I doing wrong? How can I access the portal I created? I can still login to the organization portal using SSO fine, and it shows my dev portal in my portal list, but again when I click it, it takes me to login.
you might have to request your super admin to turn off SSO for this portal, I know it is possible to turn SSO off for specific users, not sure how it works for specific portals...
I think to setup the SSO you need to configure some setting in your identity provider - <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/can-i-use-single-sign-on-sso-with-HubSpot>
I talked to my super admin and he said he can’t see / doesn’t have access to my dev portal so he can’t enable SSO for it.
Is there a way I can see which 3rd party apps have been authorized on top of my CRM? Can I get when they were authorized?
